@title Auditor Enrollments Interface
 @author Enrique R. D'Angelo

@notice Returns and auditor enrollment struct data for a give auditId
 @param auditId functional key of the audit Item tokenId = auditId

@title Auditor Enrollments Interface
 @author Enrique R. D'Angelo

@notice Returns and auditor enrollment struct data for a give auditId
 @param auditId functional key of the audit Item tokenId = auditId

params.auditId: functional key of the audit Item tokenId = auditId
params.auditor: address of the auditor being added to the audit enrollments

returns.success: true the systme was able to add the auditor to the audit enrollments, otherwise returns false

params.auditId: functional key of the audit Item tokenId = auditId
functional key of the audit Item tokenId = auditId
params.auditors: array of auditors enrolled to the audit item

isAuditEnrolled(uint256).details: Used to check as required for certain functions assuming there is and enrollment struct already in place

params.auditId: functional key of the audit Item tokenId = auditId

returns._0: true if the audit has enrollments, otherwise returns false

params.auditId: functional key of the audit Item tokenId = auditId

returns.success: true the systme was able to update the audit enrollments, otherwise returns false

addAuditor(uint256,address).notice: Adds an auditor to the enrolled auditors list

getAuditEnrollment(uint256).notice: Returns and auditor enrollment struct data for a give auditId

insertAuditEnrollment(uint256,address[]).notice: Adds a set of auditors enrolled to a given audit item

isAuditEnrolled(uint256).notice: Finds if the system has enrollments registered for the audit item

updateauditors(uint256,address[]).notice: Updates the whole list of auditors enrolled to an auditId
